text: Hunting Flies is a 2016 Norwegian drama film directed by Izer Aliu. It was screened in the Discovery section at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival. It was nominated for the 2017 Nordic Council Film Prize. ==Cast== * Burhan Amiti as Ghani the Teacher ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 drama films Category:Norwegian films Category:Norwegian drama films Category:Albanian-language films
title: Hunting Flies (2016 film)
